backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a redirect-logic update tied to frontend/index.html with linked components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten short descriptions of various frontend files and their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/styles with custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark mode and global background/foreground application.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point including fonts, canonical link, and reachabilityâ€‘based redirect logic for Caffeine draft domains.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component assembling all page sections and conditionally rendering the Projects section.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Simple footer displaying a copyright line with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/layout/Section.t: Reusable layout wrapper providing consistent section structure with optional title and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Responsive navigation bar with dynamic links, scroll behavior, mobile menu, and CTA button.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section showing summary, location, email, and optionally phone in a styled card layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders a contact section with email copy functionality, optional phone display, and social links pulled from resumeData.
frontend/src/components/sections/Educati: Displays education items from resumeData with degree, institution, location, details, and period formatting.
frontend/src/components/sections/Experie: Shows work experience entries from resumeData including role details, company info, description, and bullet highlights.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner showing name, title, and buttons that scroll to contact or about sections with decorative background.
frontend/src/components/sections/Project: Lists featured projects with title, description, technologies, and optional external link, sourced from resumeData.
frontend/src/components/sections/SkillsS: Renders skills either in a special two-column layout for one category or a multi-category grid with styled skill tags.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, and identity loading using AuthClient and DelegationIdentity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables, base styles, and custom utility classes for layout and gradient text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/resumeData.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for resume content and provides structured resume data for experience, education, skills, and personal info.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, radii, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for the resume website's ongoing development.
